main.name: José Luis Ramos
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: Currently looking for a remote job in which I could apply all my knowledge in Python and Django. I’m open to both Full Stack development in Django or DRF-based applications with some JS/TS framework on frontend.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: These are the technologies I'm more familiarized with!

education.degree: CFGS Development of Web and Multi-platforom Applications
education.description: Learned everything about Full Stack Development. Developed some Web Applications as well as Native Phone Applications

work.title: Remote Full Stack Developer
work.description: Spanish company in which I am currently working, developing their own product (openODS) and some consultancy development for several companies.

work.title: Remote Full Stack Developer
work.description: Local web consultancy where I worked as a Full Stack Developer. Initially we worked with Django and jQuery, but I came up with the idea of start using React.js as our Front End tool. I took part in the development of several eCommerces and landing pages, as well as the Frontend and design in React Applications.

work.title: Remote Full Stack Developer
work.description: Startup that gave me the opportunity of starting my career, where I basically learned all about Django and Full Stack Web Development thank to the CTO.

work.title: Intern Mobile & Web Developer
work.description: Internship after my CFGS degree, in which I developed “hype pms”, an Android app for hotel management. Also, I got the chance to use Javascript and PHP in their website.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
